meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to 10 liters.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a dekaliter of water to be added to the pot.
meanings.sent2: The dekaliter of milk was just enough to fill the large jug.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a dekaliter of soda to the picnic was quite the workout!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a dekaliter of joy.
meanings.sent5: The dekaliter of sand poured out slowly, forming a small mound.

meanings.sent1: The dekaliter was too heavy for him to lift on his own.
meanings.sent2: She stored the flour in a dekaliter to keep it fresh.
meanings.sent3: The dekaliter on the shelf looked like a giant cupcake holder.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt as full as a dekaliter of love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The dekaliter of soup simmered on the stove, filling the kitchen with a savory aroma.
